faq.question: How To Earn?
faq.answer: Passiveeers having the triple E representing the Extra Extra Extra, enables subscribers earn in 3 different ways which are the Peer to peer system, Affiliate system, Advert Share system

faq.question: How does Peer to peer system work?
faq.answer: Subscribers make a total of 150% gain in 25days through the Passive Vault Bank securing all peer to peer fundings

faq.question: How does Affiliate system work?
faq.answer: Subscribers make 35% Income for every direct Individual's subscription plan. This is our form of gratitude and appreciation for taking Passiveeers further

faq.question: How does Advert Share System works?
faq.answer: This system is called "The Goldberg Elevator" which does not only pumps more money to the Passive Vault Bank. But also give Extra income bonuses to the fastest 1000 sharers. Thought that was all we have to offer? We ain't done yet. Subscribers of Passiveeers get to earn amazing rewards, gifts and pays by indulging in certain tasks of the system.

faq.question: What are the responsible to earn extra rewards?
faq.answer: The task as as follows: Mr & Mrs Passiveeers Challenge, Passiveeers Raid Challenge, Highest Refferal Challenge, Highest Earner, Testimony Challenge, Tiktok Challenge, Facebook Challenge, Instagram Challenge, Community Challenge, Song Challenge, Duet Challenge and more
